title: Yorktown Battlefield Part of Colonial National Historical Park: Parks as Classrooms
body: Parks as Classrooms        Curriculum Materials Colonial National Historical Park offers Virginia Standards of Learning [SOL] based educational programs to enhance your students' academic experiences. Student participation is encouraged through use of the inquiry method and hands-on activities.  All Curriculum Materials     Traveling Trunks Bring the park to your classroom. Borrowing the traveling trunk is free. Call 757-898-2411 to make arrangements to pick up the trunk from the National Park Service Visitor Center at Historic Jamestown or Yorktown Battlefield. It can be picked up any day of the week. Check out length is two weeks All Traveling Trunks
